text: Farzad Jafari () is an Iranian Football Defender who currently plays for Iranian football club Foolad in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== Jafari started his career with Esteghlal Ahvaz from youth levels. He promoted to first team after promotion to Division 1 in 2012. He was a regular starter in his first season with Esteghlal Ahvaz. As winter 2013 he joined to Esteghlal Khuzestan with a 3.5 years contract.http://www.esteghlalahwazfc.ir/index.php/useful- links/2011-10-20-22-34-34/126-2013-11-23-11-04-28http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=13920902000661 He made his debut for Esteghlal Khuzestan as 19 December 2013 against Malavan as a starter.http://www.ffiri.ir/league/102/club/10039/%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%82%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%84-%D8%A7%D9%87%D9%88%D8%A7%D8%B2/%D9%81%D8%B1%D8%B2%D8%A7%D8%AF-%D8%AC%D8%B9%D9%81%D8%B1%DB%8C/d83d8cfa-15c2-4252-ab75-445ce2732e53/player/ ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
